extension_description.message: Automatically pins tabs once they have been opened

options_notes.message:
Notes
  • Pin only on new tab-mode: Don't match protocol in URL-RegEx, e.g. example.com/ or ^example.com/ or ^example.com/foo/bar$
  • Not-in only on new tab-mode: Match protocol in URL-RegEx, e.g. code>example.com/ or ^https?://example.com/ or ^https?://example.com/foo/bar$
  • An entry kann be removed by emptying the URL-RegEx-text field.
